AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court in Maria De Jesus Garcia': court that handled Maria De Jesus Garcia's trial, made decisions on evidence suppression, and allowed presentation of evidence pertinent to the suppression motion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.camper compartment of Maria De Jesus Gar: part of the vehicle where occupants were suspected to be hiding, subject of a search by border patrol agents, and relevant to the suppression motion in Maria De Jesus Garcia's trial
